p: Plants intended for medicinal use are utilized to find the most frequently used plant species in the study area. Its value ranged from 0.200 to 0.967 ( TableÂ 2). The calculated results of MUV showed that Eucalyptus globulus Labill. was ranked first (MUV=0.967) followed by Azadirachta indica A. Juss. (MUV=0.933), Ziziphus lotus (L.) Lam. (MUV=0.9), Allium sativum L. (MUV=0.867), and Eugenia caryophyllata Thunb. (MUV=0.833), while the lowest value was found for Spinacia oleracea L. (MUV=0.200).
